amendment.description: To provide for the assumption of full ownership and control of the International Outfall Interceptor in Nogales, Arizona, by the International Boundary and Water Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 315 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 315 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Sinema to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3449-3451) To provide for the assumption of full ownership and control of the International Outfall Interceptor in Nogales, Arizona, by the International Boundary and Water Commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 315 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Sinema to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 315 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
